# Configuration file for interactive tutorials using binder.
#
# This file is used by binder to install Debian packages necessary to run the Jupyter
# notebook tutorials in the documentation.
# See also: https://mybinder.readthedocs.io/en/latest/using/config_files.html
dvipng
ghostscript
cm-super
texlive-fonts-recommended
texlive-generic-recommended
texlive-latex-base
texlive-latex-extra
texlive-latex-recommended
texlive-publishers
texlive-science
texlive-xetex
